alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Chambers; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Colorado; Fort Bend; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Colorado, Wharton, central Jackson, Galveston, southern Fort Bend, Brazoria, southeastern Chambers, northwestern Matagorda and southeastern Harris Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bayou Vista to near Boling-Iago to near Nursery. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearland, League City, southeastern Missouri City, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Friendswood, southern Rosenberg, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Dickinson, northern Bay City, La Marque, Santa Fe, southwestern Seabrook, El Campo, Webster, Wharton and Hitchcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
